column4: Hi guys. I have a bit of a major problem here. i recently reinstalled Windows 7, and it knocked GRUB2 out as the main bootloader and put the default as NTLDR instead.
as a result i have a non-bootable Ubunut 9.10 partition
look at the urls from ubottu, theres a guide on recovering grub there
thanks a bunch. downloading the ISO right now ;D
